description:
#1 Outdoors app on iPhone!

AllTrails is THE app for exploring the outdoors.

Going on a trip to a national park? Looking for a place near home to hike, bike, or run? Searching for something new to do on the weekends?

Even in a big city you might be surprised by how much nature surrounds you, and never has it been easier to discover and share!

Browse through guides for 50,000 trails across North America complete with photos, reviews, and tracks for outdoor activities including everything from hiking and mountain biking to fly-fishing and snowshoeing.

Know a good trail that's not in our database? Live outside North America? Record your tracks with our GPS tracker to add trails for others to view and follow.


EXPLORE TRAILS
• Browse or search for trails closest to you
• See community photos, reviews, and tracks
• View topographic maps and routes for trails

RECORD & SHARE
• Track your activities with your iPhone's GPS
• Add geo-tagged photos to your recorded tracks
• Easily share your adventures with friends

CONTRIBUTE
• Add new trails not already in our database
• Read and write trail reviews
• Share your photos with others

MORE
• Syncs with your AllTrails.com account
• Access our entire trail database without Internet
• Works with Magellan Echo smart sports watch


GO PRO
• National Geographic TOPO! maps (US only)
• 200+ Trails Illustrated maps (US only)
• Save map areas to your phone for offline use
• Create trip plans & routes with Map Editor
• Print maps on-demand before hitting the trail

AllTrails Pro is available for $49.99/year. You can subscribe and pay through your iTunes account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Auto-renew can be turned off anytime by going to your Account Settings in iTunes after purchase.

Access more AllTrails Pro features on our website: http://alltrails.com

Go out and rediscover the outdoors!

---

COMPATIBILITY
• Account required to add trails, tracks, or photos
• Trails currently only available in North America
• Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life


SUPPORT
We love hearing from users! Please email us here:
iphone-support@alltrails.com

We respond to all email. Feel free to complain, praise, or just say hello!


Terms of Use: http://alltrails.com/terms
Privacy Policy: http://alltrails.com/privacy
